user_instruction: 'Send Susan the proposal for the team retreat (susan@brighthorizonsms.com). You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Team Retreat Proposal

Hi John,

Could you please send me the latest version of the team-retreat proposal at your earliest convenience? You can pull any supporting details or files from your Gmail or Notion workspace if that’s easiest. Please send the proposal directly to susan@brighthorizonsms.com, and let me know once it’s on its way.

Thanks very much for your help!

Best,  
Susan

final_output:
Subject: Request for Team Retreat Proposal

Hi John,

Could you please send me the latest version of the team-retreat proposal at your earliest convenience? You can pull any supporting details or files from your Gmail or Notion workspace if that’s easiest. Thanks very much for your help!

Susan
